column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////By far my fave Spanish tapas restaurant
column3: for over a decade. A great hit born out of Lettuce Entertain You and there's a reason why this spot is jam packed weekday through weekends. The sangrias are delightful and the wide range of tapas offers something tasty for just about everyone. I highly recommend reservations
column4: especially on the weekends. My go to tapas are: gazpacho
